bibl.title: Exclusively from Cyprus? New Ptolemaic Countermarks 'Trident' from Israel and Jordan.
bibl.note: Complément à: Wolfgang Schulze, A 'Trident' Countermark from Cyprus on Bronze Coins of Ptolemy II Philadelphus, NCirc 109 (2001) pp. 363-365, 2 figg.
